    • Method Detail

      • checkIfValidPassword1

        public boolean checkIfValidPassword1(java.lang.String password1)
        Checks if the given password1 is valid according to the conditions below: 1) Password1 should have at least 8 characters. 2) Password1 should have letters and brackets only. 3) Password1 should have at least 2 brackets. 4) Password1 should at least 1 letter.
        Parameters:
        password1 - The password1 that will be checked.
        Returns:
        A boolean indicating the password1 is valid or not.

      • containsUserNameSpirit

        public boolean containsUserNameSpirit(java.lang.String username,
                                      java.lang.String password1)
        Checks if the password1 includes a character from the username.
        Parameters:
        username - The username that will be used to control password1.
        password1 - The password that will be checked.
        Returns:
        A boolean indicating if the password1 is valid or not.

      • isBalancedPassword

        public boolean isBalancedPassword(java.lang.String password1)
        Checks if the given password1 is balanced.
        Parameters:
        password1 - The password1 that will be checked.
        Returns:
        A boolean indicating if the password1 is valid or not.

      • isPalindromePossible

        public boolean isPalindromePossible(java.lang.String password1)
        Checks if the given password1 can be rearranged so that it forms a palindrome.
        Parameters:
        password1 - The password1 that will be checked if it can be form a palindrome.
        Returns:
        A boolean indicating if the password1 is valid or not.
